official_title: A bill to designate the New York Bulk and Foreign Mail Center at Jersey City, New Jersey, as the "Michael McDermott Bulk and Foreign Mail Center".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the New York Bulk and Foreign Mail Center, Jersey City, New Jersey, as the Michael McDermott Bulk and Foreign Mail Center.

titles.title: A bill to designate the New York Bulk and Foreign Mail Center at Jersey City, New Jersey, as the "Michael McDermott Bulk and Foreign Mail Center".
